name: mris_ca_deform
description: Deforms a surface to match it to a volumetric map of cortical labels.

inputs.name: Input Surface
inputs.description: The input surface file to be deformed.

inputs.name: Transform
inputs.description: The transform file, typically a matrix that aligns the volumes.

inputs.name: Intensity Volume
inputs.description: The intensity volume that is used in the deformation process.

inputs.name: Output Surface
inputs.description: The file name for the output, deformed surface.

output-files.name: Deformed Surface
output-files.description: The result of the deformation process, output surface file.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
